name: Joan Holman
description:
Joan Holman is a nationally-acclaimed "Internet Marketing Guru" and works in all areas of marketing including website development, online or offline marketing, branding, marketing communications, social media, public relations, strategy development.Â 
Joan Holman is an author, ghostwriter, book coach and BOOK MARKETING DIVA, and a nationally acclaimed Internet marketing and publishing expert who works with authors, entrepreneurs, business professionals and leaders.
